key.name: indicators
key.description: JSON array of status indicators with their names, ready icons, and working icons

key.name: position
key.description: Position of the status widget in the top bar: left, center, or right

key.name: show-labels
key.description: Whether to show text labels next to indicators

key.name: max-indicators-per-app
key.description: Maximum number of indicators each application can create

key.name: rate-limit-ms
key.description: Minimum time between D-Bus calls from the same application

key.name: enable-logging
key.description: Log D-Bus calls and security events for monitoring
